title:
Moduli spaces of slope-semistable sheaves with reflexive Seshadri
  graduations
abstract:
We study the moduli stacks of slope-semistable torsion-free coherent sheaves
that admit reflexive, respectively locally free, Seshadri graduations on a
smooth projective variety. We show that they are open in the stack of coherent
sheaves and that they admit good moduli spaces when the field characteristic is
zero. In addition, in the locally free case we prove that the resulting moduli
space is a quasi-projective scheme.
